text: swn brrda phu sraththa læa kratha khwam di thanghlay læa sraththa nı sing thi thuk prathan kæ muhammad læa wa xalkurxan nan pen sacthrrm ma cak phracea khxng phwk khea phraxngkh ca thrng lblang khwam chaw khxng phwk khea hı xxk pi cak phwk khea læa ca thrng prabprung sphaph khxng phwk khea hı di khun
